title: What is the best way to screen share with my Android devices? - Quora

response.answer_text: I dont do much screen sharing but I have tried AllCast by ClockWorkMod and it work awesome. And recently I tried Vysor works gr8 too but you have to buy. Free version only shares your screen at 240p/360p. MERRY CHRISTMAS
ScreenMeet of course! Fremium version available here Live screen share your android to a web url
